description:
~~~Over 1,370 students enrolled in my courses.~~~ (Updated as of June 2016)

~~~See why and how my videos helped over 110,000 students---

In this course you will learn about creating your own portfolio of investments that will be your passive income for the rest of your life.

Anyone should take this course, since anyone would like to have 2 or 3 more salaries per year, coming from passive income.

In this course you will find videos for each chapter, followed by a detailed content.

You should be able to complete this course within two weeks and retain all of the material. You should also come back to the course and repeat when needed.

This course is structured in different chapters, most of them containing a video for easier understanding of the particular topic.

This course will help you produce many sources of passive income that will not require your physical presence and work.
title: What College Didn't Teach You (Investments)
